entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 8:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure: 97.5 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: E 13 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
